title: How Do You Say Facebook in Russian, GOP Smoke Bombs 11.1.17
itunes:title: How Do You Say Facebook in Russian, GOP Smoke Bombs 11.1.17
description:
In episode 18, Jack & Miles are joined by writer & show creator Reed Agnew to discuss Russian Facebook ads, Paul Manafort, George Papadopoulos, Sarah Huckabee Sanders deflection tactics, Robert Mueller possibly getting fired by Trump, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
